channel.title: Kind of stupid question but
channel.description:
On the section of the ulitimate tutorial guide it asks you to right click and edit compile.bat. How ever when i right click there is no edit option there at all.
I know this question is probably stupidly simple or something

item.title: Kind of stupid question but
item.dc:creator: @Gol_Goroth Gol Goroth
item.description:
@Gol_Goroth wrote:

I just done as the guide said and extracted to “here” as the option said.

You reckon I should extract the source I’m using to documents and edit it there?

Read full topic

item.title: Kind of stupid question but
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

Have u extracted the fodler from winrar or where ever ur folder is. u must extract the folder to somewhere, i extract mine to my documents, then go on it and right clikc compile and then ull c edit.
